author: cbs8
title: See Wendy Williams Live in Spartanburg SC and Stay at Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
text:
Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers affordable lodging to guests attending the Wendy Williams 'Sit Down Tour' in Spartanburg, SC on August 20, 2015.
 SPARTANBURG, SC, August 01, The Hampton Inn North I-85 Spartanburg SC hotel offers affordable lodging to guests attending the Wendy Williams 'Sit Down Tour' in Spartanburg on August 20. The popular talk show host and TV personality will appear at Spartanburg Memorial Auditorium with an unforgettable evening of talk and comedy. Ticket prices begin at $63.
"Our hotel offers convenient and affordable lodging just five minutes from downtown Spartanburg," explains Dawn Allison, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85. "We welcome Wendy Williams' fans attending her show on August 20," continues Ms. Allison.
The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 recently received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Comfortable guest rooms feature a microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Travelers will enjoy a restful night's sleep on Clean & Fresh Hampton Beds . Guests can cool off in the hotel's refreshing outdoor pool or work out in the fitness center. Other property amenities include a 24-hour business center and coin laundry. The Hampton On the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is complimentary. Guests with limited time may choose a convenient Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bag on weekday mornings. This Hampton Inn is a non-smoking property.
Nearby Upstate attractions include Chapman Cultural Center, Carolina Foothills Artisan Center, and the Premium Outlets at Gaffney. Current specials at this Spartanburg South Carolina hotel include the Hampton Romance Package and the Weekend Getaway Package, with late checkout. HHonors members can earn Double Points or Double Miles through August 31, 2015.
For information and tickets to the Wendy Williams 'Sit Down Tour' in Spartanburg, visit www.crowdpleaser.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 at Exit 78, call (864) 577-9080 or visit www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com .
About Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
This Spartanburg Hotel invites guests to step back in time to the colonial era or indulge in modern luxuries and recreation in Spartanburg, South Carolina. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg Hotel on North I-85 is situated to offer easy access of the Duncan business centers and is within five minutes of Wofford College. Guests can take a short drive into Greenville to see historic landmarks or enjoy world-class entertainment. This Spartanburg hotel offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.
For more information visit http://www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
